title: No Way Out
description: Beautiful Montecito, California, seems like the last place disaster wouldn't strike. But four families, along with their whole community, are about to find out otherwise. Keith Morrison reports in this Dateline classic. Originally aired on NBC on April 15, 2018.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
